entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Rondeau (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:08 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind becoming south 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early in the morning. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 in the morning then diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late in the evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow or freezing rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or freezing rain. High zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain. Windy. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers. High 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 7. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 70 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Windy. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. High 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
